name: MTLVertexDescriptor
desc: An object that describes how to organize and map data to a vertex function.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Resets the default state for the vertex descriptor.

items.name: var attributes: MTLVertexAttributeDescriptorArray
items.desc: An array of state data that describes how vertex attribute data is stored in memory and is mapped to arguments for a vertex shader function.

items.name: var layouts: MTLVertexBufferLayoutDescriptorArray
items.desc: An array of state data that describes how data are fetched by a vertex shader function when rendering primitives.
